channel.title: PI Round Decimal?

item.title: PI Round Decimal?
item.dc:creator: @Impious_Lols Impious Lols
item.description:
@Impious_Lols wrote:

I have a kdr, but the decimal goes on for a rather long time.

Is there a way I can round the decimal to the hundredth spot?

} else if (cmd.equals("kdr")) { double KDR = ((double)c.KC)/((double)c.DC); c.forcedChat("My Kill/Death ratio is "+c.KC+"/"+c.DC+"; "+KDR+".");
